description: Before we can set up your Auto Pay service, you need to create a London Road User Charging account.

texts: {"template":"intro","texts":["Pay the Congestion Charge and Ultra Low Emission Zone (ULEZ) charge automatically each month."],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}
Auto Pay records the number of charging days a vehicle travels in the Congestion Charge zone and, if your vehicle does not meet the emissions standards, the ULEZ. It bills users each month.
You need to create a London Road User charging account before setting up Auto Pay. (Already have an account? Sign in now. )
To set up Auto Pay you will need your:
{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Vehicle registration details","Bank or payment card details"]}
You can add a maximum of 5 vehicles to Auto Pay. If you're a business with 6 or more vehicles you can set up Fleet Auto Pay .
The Â£10 registration charge for each vehicle added to Auto Pay must be paid every year. You don't have to pay this charge immediately - it will be added to your first statement.
